caption: Figure 5: Subjective listening results
description: The chart displays the results of subjective listening tests, comparing the MOS (Mean Opinion Score) and speaker similarity scores for various speech synthesis models, including ground truth, XTTS, and different variants of SALAD (Text-to-Acoustic and Semantic-to-Acoustic, both continuous and discrete).

caption: Figure 6: Inference hyperparameters influence
description: The chart displays the impact of various inference hyperparameters, such as CFG scale, noise scale, diffusion steps, and MaskGIT steps, on the UTMOS score and speaker similarity.

caption: Figure 7: High-fidelity RVQ codes
description: The chart displays the relationships between reconstruction quality, noise sensitivity, and cross entropy loss with different numbers of RVQ codebooks and VAE embedding dimensions.

caption: Figure 8: Additional results
description: The chart displays the GMM entropy drop to zero during training and the SoundStorm unmasking method performance comparison.

caption: Figure 8: Additional results
description: The chart compares three different unmasking methods in the SoundStorm model, showing that random unmasking achieves the highest UTMOS score.
